Uses of Class
supermario.Block

    • Uses of Block in supermario

      Subclasses of Block in supermario 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Bird
      Bird is a flying enemy turns around at terrain derives from Enemy class
      class  Box
      Box is a terrain like Block with special feature can be opened by hitting it from the bottom derives from Block
      class  Collectible
      Collectible blocks, items that help in the game inheritance not implemented, two implemented collectible types are different only in one function derives from Block
      class  Enemy
      common abstract class for all kinds of implemented enemies evaluates their movement and state derives from Block
      class  Goomba
      Goomba is ground enemy turns around at falls and terrain derives from Enemy class
      Fields in supermario declared as Block 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Block Mario.colidedObject
      object that Mario currently collides with
      static Block[][] Map.grid
      grid of blocks to be drawn
      Methods in supermario that return Block 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private Block Mario.collision()
      checks for any collision nearby takes all surrounding blocks in the grid, looks for non-empty if there is an object and it intersects, return it also checks for possible enemy collisions
      private Block Mario.intersect(int row, int col)
      checks if Mario does not collides with the block of given coordinates
      Methods in supermario with parameters of type Block 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected boolean Enemy.isBlocked(Block block)
      front block blocks enemy
